author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Austrian Airlines Launches Service to Marrakech in its Winter Flight ScheduleTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Austrian Airlines Launches Service to Marrakech in its Winter Flight Schedule
Austrian Airlines will once again add a new tourist destination to its flight schedule in the winter of 2015. Starting on November 14, 2015 , Austria’s national carrier will fly once per week to Marrakech in Morocco. “In addition to Miami, Mauritius and Colombo as new long-haul tourist destinations, we are now expanding our flight offering to medium-haul holiday destinations. In this way we compensate for the strong seasonality of our business, and offer passengers an interesting selection of sunny destinations both in the summer and winter months”, explains Andreas Otto, Chief Commercial Officer of Austrian Airlines.
Marrakech
Austrian Airlines will deploy an Airbus A319 on its flights to Marrakech, at a distance of around 3,200 km from Vienna. These flights operated on Saturdays will only be offered in the winter season from November 14, 2015 to April 2, 2016 . Flight time from Vienna to Marrakech is about 4 hours 15 minutes.
Air fares start at EUR 198 for round trip flights including taxes and charges.
Route Flight Number Flight day Departure – Arrival (Local times) Vienna – Marrakech OS 9771 Saturday 09:50 – 13:05 Marrakech – Vienna OS 9772 Saturday 13:55 – 19:05
Source:- Austrian Airlines
